abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Additional
            Financing for the Second Nutrition Enhancement Project for
            Senegal is to improve nutrition conditions of vulnerable
            populations, in particular those affecting growth of
            children under five in poor urban and rural areas. The
            additional credit will help implement modified and
            additional project activities which cannot be funded under
            the initial project, specifically: (i) the expansion of
            nutrition activities to scale up the project's impact
            and development effectiveness under component one
            (community-based nutrition) and component three (support for
            implementation, monitoring and evaluation of the nutrition
            development policy); and (ii) the financing gap for
            multisectoral pro-nutrition activities under component two
            (multisectoral support for nutrition).
